Product Description: Don’t let the word “recliner” fool you – this design is modern and stylish enough to fit in with the highest quality stationary upholstery! It features sloping curves and modern angles, accentuated by hand-applied accent nail trim. At the touch of a button, its power reclining mechanism can be stopped in an infinite number of comfy positions to accommodate your favorite relaxing activities. Available in fabric or leather, this item is handcrafted to order in the foothills of North Carolina using time-tested manufacturing techniques and the finest materials available. Visit one of our retailers to learn how you can make it your own. Depth fully reclined: 69″. Battery sold separately. Also available as a push-back recliner (8103-RC).
